alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 18 at 4:05AM AKDT until October 19 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...First frontal band Tuesday afternoon/evening will bring in strong winds. A second band late Tuesday night into Wednesday will produce highest gusts with a wind shift to the SW during the day Wednesday resulting in another period of high winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
